guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
most things are a better alternative to voat sadly  -- I think it came up at a bad time, when mostly only the extremes were being removed.

I just love the spirit of ruqqus  :) It's fun to watch something grow.

https://ruqqus.com/discord

most things are a better alternative to voat sadly -- I think it came up at a bad time, when mostly only the extremes were being removed.

I just love the spirit of ruqqus :) It's fun to watch something grow.

https://ruqqus.com/discord

body: This site is great so far. To be fair discord needs to be replaced with something everybody can actually use, and the mod system there needs some improving. But that's pretty much the only problem, other than that I haven't seen any censorship or problematic activity on this site.
body_html: This site is great so far. To be fair discord needs to be replaced with something everybody can actually use, and the mod system there needs some improving. But that's pretty much the only problem, other than that I haven't seen any censorship or problematic activity on this site.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Reposted from an explanation I made in another thread:

> Discord is an even worse platform than reddit where every single employee is an extreme SJW furry. It also has shady requirements, like how it now needs you to attach your phone number to not get your account banned immediately. On top of that, the corrupt staff bans a ton of people for the worst reasons, the most infamous of which is criticizing or making fun of furries (yes, *really*). I've never heard of a Discord ban getting lifted before, and seeing how banned accounts show up as deleted I doubt it's even possible for Discord to reverse one (Discord apparently doesn't hold on to deleted content like most platforms). So if someone gets banned or doesn't want to share their phone number, they can't join the Ruqqus Discord. This is very bad because right now Ruqqus literally relies on the discord for all DMs and 99% of information and announcements.

> The other problem is how the admins are not communicating with users at all when it comes to how the server is set up. They have always refused to make anyone a mod of the server, nor did they ever discuss anything about their plans for the server itself outside of their private mod channel. A few weeks ago the admins finally added a few mods because the rapid influx during reddit's banwave forced them to. But now the situation is arguably even worse than before, because now the few non-admins who were modded then have a lot of control over the server, but the admins still refuse to add anyone else as a mod or discuss plans and changes for the server with anyone except those mods, meaning < 10 users have input and everyone else probably doesn't even know about what the plans are. Those mods have tried to get the admins to add other mods who showed an interest in it but they've consistently refused. The admins also claimed that they were going to make it possible to become a mod, but it's taken them way too long so I'm convinced that it's not happening.

I complain about this way too much and if you want to find out more just look at my post and comment history and you'll find more than enough information about this.
body_html:
Reposted from an explanation I made in another thread:

Discord is an even worse platform than reddit where every single employee is an extreme SJW furry. It also has shady requirements, like how it now needs you to attach your phone number to not get your account banned immediately. On top of that, the corrupt staff bans a ton of people for the worst reasons, the most infamous of which is criticizing or making fun of furries (yes, really). I've never heard of a Discord ban getting lifted before, and seeing how banned accounts show up as deleted I doubt it's even possible for Discord to reverse one (Discord apparently doesn't hold on to deleted content like most platforms). So if someone gets banned or doesn't want to share their phone number, they can't join the Ruqqus Discord. This is very bad because right now Ruqqus literally relies on the discord for all DMs and 99% of information and announcements.

The other problem is how the admins are not communicating with users at all when it comes to how the server is set up. They have always refused to make anyone a mod of the server, nor did they ever discuss anything about their plans for the server itself outside of their private mod channel. A few weeks ago the admins finally added a few mods because the rapid influx during reddit's banwave forced them to. But now the situation is arguably even worse than before, because now the few non-admins who were modded then have a lot of control over the server, but the admins still refuse to add anyone else as a mod or discuss plans and changes for the server with anyone except those mods, meaning < 10 users have input and everyone else probably doesn't even know about what the plans are. Those mods have tried to get the admins to add other mods who showed an interest in it but they've consistently refused. The admins also claimed that they were going to make it possible to become a mod, but it's taken them way too long so I'm convinced that it's not happening.

I complain about this way too much and if you want to find out more just look at my post and comment history and you'll find more than enough information about this.

body: Never heard of here until it was mentioned on the stream and already I like it. It looks cleaner, loads well, and doesn't have the pesky stench of modern Reddit. It's beautiful and I feel at home.
